entry.def: Radiology is the branch of medical science that uses X-rays and radioactive substances to treat diseases.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of medical science dealing with the medical use of X-rays or other penetrating radiation
2. (radiology) examination of the inner structure of opaque objects using X rays or other penetrating radiation
